message.content:
cs.GT, cs.IR, cs.DS, cs.MA, cs.LG 

The paper deals with the problem of adword auctions, which involves designing mechanisms for pricing advertising slots on search engines. This problem falls under the domain of game theory (cs.GT) as it involves designing incentive-compatible mechanisms for auctions. It also involves information retrieval (cs.IR) as the valuation per click is based on the identity of the advertiser and the slot. The paper proposes computational methods for solving the optimization problem, which falls under the domain of data structures (cs.DS) and machine learning (cs.MA). Finally, the paper proposes a new mechanism for rank-based allocation, which falls under the domain of learning theory (cs.LG).
